name: @Kryptoskatt/mcp-server
description: Enable AI assistants to interact seamlessly with the DefiLlama API by translating MCP tool calls into API requests. Dynamically generate tools from the DefiLlama OpenAPI specification to provide up-to-date and comprehensive DeFi data access. Simplify integration with DefiLlama's public API through a standardized MCP interface.

tools.name: get_protocol__by_protocol
tools.description: Get historical TVL of a protocol and breakdowns by token and chain

tools.name: get_v2_historicalChainTvl
tools.description: Get historical TVL (excludes liquid staking and double counted tvl) of DeFi on all chains

tools.name: get_v2_historicalChainTvl__by_chain
tools.description: Get historical TVL (excludes liquid staking and double counted tvl) of a chain

chain.description: chain slug, you can get these from /chains or the chains property on /protocols

tools.name: get_tvl__by_protocol
tools.description: Simplified endpoint to get current TVL of a protocol

tools.name: get_prices_current__by_coins
tools.description:
Get current prices of tokens by contract address
Error Responses:
502: Internal error

coins.description: set of comma-separated tokens defined as {chain}:{address}

searchWidth.description: time range on either side to find price data, defaults to 6 hours

tools.name: get_stablecoincharts_all
tools.description: Get historical mcap sum of all stablecoins

stablecoin.description: stablecoin ID, you can get these from /stablecoins

tools.name: get_pools
tools.description: Retrieve the latest data for all pools, including enriched information such as predictions

tools.name: get_chart__by_pool
tools.description: Get historical APY and TVL of a pool

pool.description: pool id, can be retrieved from /pools (property is called pool)

tools.name: get_overview_dexs
tools.description: List all dexs along with summaries of their volumes and dataType history data

excludeTotalDataChart.description: true to exclude aggregated chart from response

excludeTotalDataChartBreakdown.description: true to exclude broken down chart from response

tools.name: get_overview_dexs__by_chain
tools.description: List all dexs along with summaries of their volumes and dataType history data filtering by chain

chain.description: chain name, list of all supported chains can be found under allChains attribute in /overview/dexs response

excludeTotalDataChart.description: true to exclude aggregated chart from response

excludeTotalDataChartBreakdown.description: true to exclude broken down chart from response

tools.name: get_summary_dexs__by_protocol
tools.description: Get summary of dex volume with historical data

excludeTotalDataChart.description: true to exclude aggregated chart from response

excludeTotalDataChartBreakdown.description: true to exclude broken down chart from response

tools.name: get_overview_fees
tools.description: List all protocols along with summaries of their fees and revenue and dataType history data

dataType.description: Desired data type, dailyFees by default.

excludeTotalDataChart.description: true to exclude aggregated chart from response

excludeTotalDataChartBreakdown.description: true to exclude broken down chart from response

tools.name: get_overview_fees__by_chain
tools.description: List all protocols along with summaries of their fees and revenue and dataType history data by chain

chain.description: chain name, list of all supported chains can be found under allChains attribute in /overview/fees response

dataType.description: Desired data type, dailyFees by default.

excludeTotalDataChart.description: true to exclude aggregated chart from response

excludeTotalDataChartBreakdown.description: true to exclude broken down chart from response

tools.name: get_summary_fees__by_protocol
tools.description: Get summary of protocol fees and revenue with historical data

dataType.description: Desired data type, dailyFees by default.

tools.name: get_yield_pools_enhanced
tools.description: Fetch DeFi yield pools with enhanced filtering and data transformation. Returns symbol, project, tvlUsd, apy, apyMean30d, predictions, poolUrl, and projectUrl for each pool.

limit.description: Optional limit for number of results to return (e.g., 5, 10)

tools.name: generate_yield_analysis_prompt
tools.description: Generate a comprehensive prompt for analyzing DeFi yield pools data.

chain.description: Optional blockchain filter for focused analysis

project.description: Optional project filter for focused analysis
